attributes.action: Don't spend £250,000,000 on a vanity yacht. Let's fund the RNLI instead.
attributes.additional_details: The yacht will serve no purpose. It won't help or mean anything to almost the entire UK population. The RNLI save lives everyday. Let's fund them to make sure they have better training and capabilities to continue their good work.
attributes.background: I want the government to cancel any plans to build a yacht the country doesn't need and fund the RNLI instead

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Cancel plans to commission a new Royal Yacht
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584822
